description: This file defines a mock class for testing a device::HostImpl interface in C++ using Google Mock. It provides mock methods for various device interface functions such as getting sleep modes, ports, devices, and handling events related to display, audio, HDMI, composite, video device, and output port.

classes.name: HostImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for device::HostImpl interface, providing mocked implementations for its virtual methods.

classes.name: IDisplayEventsImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for device::IDisplayEventsImpl, simulating display event callbacks.

classes.name: IAudioOutputPortEventsImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for device::IAudioOutputPortEventsImpl, simulating audio port event callbacks.

classes.name: IDisplayDeviceEventsImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for device::IDisplayDeviceEventsImpl, simulating HDMI hot plug events.

classes.name: IHdmiInEventsImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for device::IHdmiInEventsImpl, simulating HDMI input port events.

classes.name: ICompositeInEventsImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for device::ICompositeInEventsImpl, simulating composite input port events.

classes.name: IVideoDeviceEventsImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for device::IVideoDeviceEventsImpl, simulating video device events such as zoom and framerate changes.

classes.name: IVideoOutputPortEventsImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for device::IVideoOutputPortEventsImpl, simulating video output port events like resolution and HDR changes.
